mapper.select: select sys_role.id,sys_role.role_code,sys_role.role_name,sys_role.role_desc,sys_role.sys_role_flag, sys_user.id as user_id,sys_user.username,sys_department.name,sys_department.area from sys_role,sys_user,sys_department,sys_user_role where sys_role.id=#{id} and sys_user_role.user_id=sys_user.id and sys_user.department_id=sys_department.id and sys_role.id=sys_user_role.role_id
